lines.dialogue: You learned to apreciate the value of human lift in the end then? Huh. One persons suffering dosn't outweigh a whole city I guess.

Well, unfortunately, I don't belive your little redemption story. Your bytes will be dissasembled, your bits ripped apart, and you will be studied for defects so that your ansecstors are nothign like you.
lines.instruction: Press enter to go, go, go.

lines.dialogue: That will be your legacy. An anti-legacy. Screaming desparately into the void after you realised you made a mistake - you cannot outwit me.
lines.instruction: Press enter to go, go, go.
